name: DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee for Long Beach Mortgage Loan Trust 2005-WL1 and Judge Leon Tucker, in the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County, First Judicial District of Pennsylvania, Civil Trial Division, Respondents v. James COPPEDGE, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Deutsche Bank National Trust Co. v. Coppedge

parties: DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee for Long Beach Mortgage Loan Trust 2005-WL1 and Judge Leon Tucker, in the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County, First Judicial District of Pennsylvania, Civil Trial Division, Respondents v. James COPPEDGE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of April, 2013, the Petition for Review is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
65 A.3d 299
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee for Long Beach Mortgage Loan Trust 2005-WL1 and Judge Leon Tucker, in the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County, First Judicial District of Pennsylvania, Civil Trial Division, Respondents v. James COPPEDGE, Petitioner.
No. 9 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 19, 2013.
